pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with the President of the United States of America, Donald Trump | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister spoke yesterday evening with United States President Donald Trump. 

The two leaders discussed the Presidentâ€™s summit with North Korea, the situation in Venezuela, and the tension between India and Pakistan on which the Prime Minister and the President agreed on the need for de-escalation. 

The Prime Minister raised the issue of steel and aluminum tariffs and expressed the need for the removal of tariffs.

The two leaders looked forward to staying in touch on these and other important issues.
